attributes.additional_details:
Fiona Bone, 32, and Nicola Hughes, 23, officers of the Greater Manchester Police force were killed in the line of duty while attending a 'routine incident' on 18th September 2012.

This news has not only shocked and saddened those involved, but the whole country. Take action now to have the whole UK Police Force Armed.

Armed & equipped, ready at your service. To reduce crime and protect our communities.
